thread.title: Newswire: Here’s video of Harrison Ford’s most recent plane incident
thread.title_full: Newswire: Here’s video of Harrison Ford’s most recent plane incident

author: Esther Zuckerman
title: Newswire: Here’s video of Harrison Ford’s most recent plane incident
text:
Share Tweet 
Last week news broke that roguish old pilot Harrison Ford had yet another mishap when he was out flying. This time, his plane whizzed right over a American Airlines 737 and landed on a taxiway instead of a runway in Orange County. According to NBC News , Ford asked the following terrifying question on air traffic control recordings: “Was that airliner meant to be underneath me?” The situation prompted a Federal Aviation Administration investigation, and now there’s video from TMZ which shows Ford‘s plane doing exactly what it was reported to have been doing. 
The footage features two angles of the incident. Back in 2015, Ford crashed a vintage plane into a golf course .
